category: Herbs that Clear Heat and Purge Fire

action.primary: Clears Heat from the Ying and Xue stages, relieves Fire toxicity, cools the Blood, clears skin blotches and stops bleeding

indications: Ying or Xue Stage Heat or Blood Heat with a very high fever and chaotic movement of Blood (erythema, purpura, epistaxis, hematemesis, convulsions and delirium)

action.primary: Clears the Heart and calms the Shen
Clears Heat and extinguishes Liver Wind

indications: Warm-Heat pathogen diseases when the Heat enters the Ying or Xue levels with unremitting high fever, loss of consciousness, delirium, convulsions or manic behavior

contraindications: This is an endangered species, do not use.
Use with great caution during pregnancy.
Do not use for rashes with Qi Deficiency where there is no high fever.
incompatibilities: Antagonizes Rx. Carmichaeli #{ZhiChuanWu} Chuan Wu Tou.
Antagonizes Rx. Aconiti Kusnezoffii #{ZhiCaoWu} Zhi Cao Wu.
Antagonizes Scl. Omphalia Lapidescens #{LeiWan} Lei Wan.
interactions: This herb potentiates the effect of barbiturates but does not counteract the effects of pentylenetetrazol or caffeine.
